survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with AI-Powered Virtual Personal Stylist Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess customer satisfaction and preferences regarding AI-powered virtual personal stylist services, focusing on usability, recommendations, and overall experience.
